Title: Codenames
Description: red and blue teams compete over who will guess all their words first

Title: Skribble.io
Description: skribbl.io is a free multiplayer drawing and guessing game.

Title: Cards Against Humanity
Description: Cards Against Humanity is an adult party game in which players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using words or phrases

Title: Among Us
Description: Everyone�s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you�re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery.

Title: Shell Shockers
Description: Shell Shockers is a multiplayer.io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns.

Title: Ludo
Description: In Ludo, your goal is to get all four of your checker pieces around the board and back to your home color.

Title: Uno
Description: Play the cards in your hand which match the pile by either color or number.

Title: Hangman
Description: Hangman is a classic word game in which you must guess the secret word one letter at a time.

Title: PubG
Description: An online multiplayer battle royale game

Title: 8 ball pool
Description: Play billiards against other players & friends in 1-on-1 matches

Title: Chess
Description: Kill your opponents king before he kills yours

Title: Heads Up
Description: Heads Up! is just that, a fun twist on charades!

Title: Fortnite
Description: Fortnite Battle Royale is a player-versus-player game for up to 100 players, where the last player, duo, or squad remaining is the winner.

Title: Castle Crashers
Description: Hack, slash, and smash your way to victory in order to save your princess, defend your kingdom, and crash some castles!

Title: Town of Salem
Description: Players assume the role of either town or mafia and are assessed on their ability to convincingly lie as well as detect when other players are lying.

Title: Pok�mon Showdown
Description: An online Pok�mon battle simulator where opponents build there own teams or use random Pok�mon in a 1v1 battle.

Title: The Wiki Game
Description: Players start on a wikipedia document and must use hyperlinks to get to a target page.

Title: slither.io
Description: Players control an ever growing snake to atain control of a board.

Title: Duck Game
Description: Players control ducks who use guns, swords and other assorted items to be the last player standing in the round.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack includes You Don't Know Jack,  Drawful, Word Spud, Lie Swatter,  and Fibbage XL.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 2
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack includes Bidiots, Earwax, Bomb Corp, Quiplash XL, and Fibbage 2.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack includes Fakin' It, Tee K.O., Guesspionage, Trivia Murder Party, and Quiplash 2.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 4
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack includes Monster Seeking Monster, Civic Doodle, Bracketeering, Survive the Internet, Fibbage3 and Fibbage: Enough About You.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 5
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more.  This pack features You Don't Know Jack, Patently Stupid, Zeeple Dome, Split the Room, and Mad Verse City.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 6
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack features Role Models, Dictionarium, Push the Button, Joke Boat, and Trivia Murder Party 2.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 7
Description: A medley of games where players use their phones to answer trivia, draw pictures, write jokes and more. This pack includes Champed Up, Talking Points, The Devils and The Details, Blather Round and Quiplash 3.

Title: Sporcle
Description: A trivia website filled with trivia of all categories. Sporcle Showdowns allow for 1v1 trivia competitions.

Title: Final Fantasy XIV
Description: Players enter the world of Eorzea where they must complete quests and raids to prevent the world from falling into chaos once again.

Title: Spyfall
Description: A strategy game where a group of people are given a role and a location and attempt to find a spy among them, the spy must find out where the group is located.

Title: Drawful 2
Description: challenges players to draw ridiculous prompts on their smartphones and tablets.

Title: Mario Kart Tour
Description: Race against friends to reach the finish line first in the ninth installment of Mario Kart

Title: Settlers of Catan
Description: After a long voyage of great deprivation, your ships have finally reached the coast of an uncharted island. However, other explorers have also landed on Catan: The race to settle the island has begun! Build roads and cities, trade skillfully and become Lord or Lady of Catan!

Title: Kahoot
Description: Kahoot! is a game-based learning platform that makes it easy to create, share and play learning games or trivia quizzes in minutes.

Title: Trivia Crack
Description: Have fun challenging your friends and enemies in the hottest trivia game!

Title: Just Dance Now
Description: Enjoy Just Dance's greatest songs and choreographies without a video game console

Title: Words With Friends 2
Description: Connect with loved ones, expand your vocabulary, and show off your spelling bee skills as you search for the highest scoring word in this beloved classic free wrod game

Title: Monopoly
Description: Roll the dice and buy, sell, build, and scheme your way to become a rich landlord in MONOPOLY

Title: Scattergories
Description: The objective of the 2-to-6-player game is to score points by uniquely naming objects within a set of categories, given an initial letter, within a time limit.

Title: Psych
Description: Choose from a variety of fun and hilarious categories, such as �The Truth Comes Out,� in which you and your friends become the game! Get ready to answer funny and ridiculous questions about one another, like �What�s the last thing David googled?�

Title: Cluedo
Description: CLUEDO, also known as CLUE, is the classic mystery game. WHO, with WHAT weapon and WHERE!?

Title: Crazy 8
Description: Crazy Eights is a shedding-type card game for two to seven players. The object of the game is to be the first player to discard all of their cards.

Title: Checkers
Description: The goal of Checkers, or "Draughts", is to remove all your opponent's pieces from the board. Use your mouse to move your pieces around the board. Your pieces can only move forward one tile diagonally (they always stay on the brown tiles).

Title: Battleship Board Game
Description: The objective of the game is to destroy the opposing player's fleet

Title: The Game of Life
Description: Attend college, accept a job and play minigames in this interactive app that is fun for the whole family.

Title: Game Pigeon
Description: Have fun with your friends and family by playing this collection of excellent multiplayer games via iMessage!

Title: Gang Beasts
Description: Attempt to control you character and try to pummel other players until only one wrestler is left standing.

Title: Golf with your Friends
Description: Play mini-golf on wacky courses with your friends. Try new game modes including zero-gravity and baskeball?

Title: Overcooked
Description: Overcooked is a chaotic couch co-op cooking game. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff.

Title: Adventure Quest
Description: The best free online fantasy RPG on the net!  Join parties, fight monsters and complete quests.

Title: Exploding Kittens
Description: Exploding Kittens is a multiplayer card game for people who are into kittens and explosions and laser beams and sometimes goats.
